content:
In the temporarily occupied territories, Russians conduct an information operation to discredit the Ukrainian underground.

About thisinformsCenter for National Resistance (CNS).

Yes, the Russians spread fake correspondence with teenagers who were allegedly recruited by guerrillas to organize a terrorist attack in Crimean schools.

"In this way, the enemy plans to shift responsibility to Ukrainians for the mass execution of Russians in Moscow," the CNS said.

The department states that "the Kremlin regime uses death only to spread hatred and even greater deaths."

The center noted that resistance does not cooperate with minors. They also urge Ukrainians to be cautious and avoid massive places of people, so as not to be a victim of another Russian provocation.

As reportedArmyinform, Foreign Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Kuleba urged the West not to allow Putin to impose a deception of Ukraine's alleged connection with the terrorist attack in the City Hall City Hall concert hall.
title: Russia launched another fake on discrediting the Ukrainian underground
description: About it reports the Center for National Resistance (CNS). Yes, the Russians spread fake ...
author: Army Inform
